Horrendous dessication was a necromancy spell of epic magic.
Horrendous dessication caused everything to dry up within a large area that grew with the casters skill. The effect caused organic matter to dry up, the degree of which increased with the casters skill, and could easily lead to death. The same happened to bodies of water like lakes or rivers. Such places lost a large amount of their water.
The caster was safe from the drying effect. However, casting this spell caused one of the casters limbs to wither.
Horrendous dessication required somatic, verbal, and material components. The material component was one dose of dust of dryness.
